subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Australia revived its hopes of winning this year’s Tri-Nations Cup and of success in the coming World Cup with a 14-9 victory over South Africa at King’s Park in Durban, South Africa.
snippet: Australia revived its hopes of winning this year’s Tri-Nations Cup and of success in the coming World Cup with a 14-9 victory over South Africa at King’s Park in Durban, South Africa.
